maqras.text: Jiaru wo ci min tamen, jiechu tamen suo shou de zainan, name, tamen biding guzhi de zai tamen de beini zhong gengjia mangcong.
Wo [an la] que yi yong xingfa chengzhi tamen, dan tamen dui tamen de zhu [an la] haishi bu qiangong, bu qian shun.
Zhidao wo wei tamen dakaile yidao yanxing zhi men shi, tamen cai turan chengwei juewang [houhui] de.
Shi ta [an la] wei nimen chuangzaole er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], dan nimen hen shao gan'en.
Shi ta ba nimen chuangzao zai dadishang,[fuhuo ri] nimen dou jiang bei jihe dao ta nali qu [zhu].
Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si, zhouye de jiaoti gui ta zhangguan [zhu]. Nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
Bu, tamen shuole leisi qian ren suo shuo dehua.
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu he kugu shi, women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?
Yiqian, women he women de zuxian que yi shouguo zhe zhong jinggao, dan zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Da di ji qizhong de yiqie dou shi shei de? Jiaru nimen zhidao.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Dou shi an la de.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu xingwu ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei shi qi ge tian de zhu he weida baozuo de zhu?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Shi an la.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [an la] ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei zhangwo wanwu de zhuquan? Shei baohu wanwu er ziji bu xu baohu? Jiaru nimen zhidao.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Shi an la.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Na nimen zenme hai bei mihuo [er beili zhengdao] ne?”
Bu, wo yi ci gei tamen zhenli [yisilan jiao], dan tamen [bu xinyang zhe] que shi shuohuang zhe.

An la meiyou renhe ernu [zhu], ye meiyou renhe zhuzai neng yu ta tongdeng, fouze, mei ge zhuzai biding duzhan ziji suo chuangzao de, biding yousheng lie bai. Zanmei an la chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Zanmei quanzhi yiqie kan bujian zhi wu he kan de jian zhi wu de zhu [an la] chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ruguo ni yiding yao rang wo kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de [xingfa],
wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao shi wo chengwei bu yi de minzhong.”
Wo dique you nengli rang ni kanjian wo suo jinggao tamen de [xingfa].
Ni dang yi shan chu e [yidebaoyuan]. Wo zui zhidao tamen suo wangyan de.
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni baohu wo mian zao emomen de youhuo.
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni baohu wo buyao rang tamen [emo] jiejin wo [zhu].”
Zhidao tamen [gei an la shezhi huoban zhe] zhong youren mianlin siwang shi, ta cai shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo fanhui chenshi ba!
Yibian wo zuo wo suo yiliu de shangong.” Jue bu keneng! Zhe zhishi ta geren de yuanwang. Zai tamen de qianmian you yige pingzhang, zhidao tamen bei fuhuo zhi ri.
Dang haojiao chui xiang shi, zai na ri, tamen zhi jian jiang bu cunzai qinshu guanxi, ye buneng huxiang xunwen.
Shei de shangong zhong [zhu], zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe;
shei de shangong qing, zhexie ren que shi shi ziji shou sun zhe, tamen jiang yong ju huo yu zhong.
Huo jiang shao tamen de lian, tamen zai huo yu li jiang tong de ziyaliezui.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nandao meiyou ren xiang nimen songduguo wo de qishi [“gulanjing”] er zao nimen fouren ma?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women de boming zhansheng womenle, women shi mi wu de minzhong.
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni cong huo yu li fang women chuqu ba! Jiaru women zai fanzui, women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen liu zai huo yu li shouru ba! Nimen buyao dui wo shuohua.”
Wo de puren zhong youxie ren chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women xinyangle, qiu ni kuanshu women, qiu ni ci min women. Ni shi renci zhong zuirenci de.”
Dan nimen ba tamen [musilin de xinyang] dang xiaobing, jingchang chaoxiao tamen, yizhi tamen shi nimen wangle zan nian wo [zhu].
Jintian, youyu tamen [zai chenshi] jianren [zhu], wo que yi baochou tamen, tamen que shi chenggong zhe.
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen zai da dishang [chenshi] douliule ji nian?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women zhi douliule yitian huo bu dao yitian, qing ni xunwen shan jisuan zhe ba!”
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen zhi douliule hen duan de shijian, jiaru nimen zhidao.
Nandao nimen renwei wo hao wu mudi er chuangzao nimen, nimen jue bu hui gui dao wo zheli lai ma?”
An la shi zhigaowushang zhe, shi zhuzai he zhenli, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, ta shi zungui baozuo de zhu.
Shei ji qiqiu an la, you qiqiu qita hao wu zhengju de zhuzai, ta jiang zai ta de zhu [an la] nali shou qingsuan. Bu xinyang zhe shi jue bu hui chenggong de.
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu [wo], qiu ni ci min [wo]. Ni shi renci zhong zui renci de.”
